name: @raha/api-shared
description: Shared code between the Raha API and client library.
author: Raha

scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "Ensure you've run 'npm version <patch|minor|major>' and then 'yarn build' in the shared/ directory before running this command." && if [ $(basename "$PWD") != "dist" ]; then echo "Error: Must publish dist/ directory; i.e. 'npm publish dist'. Aborting" && false; fi
